QuestData.Title: A Huge Problem
QuestData.Description: We finally capture this godforsaken rock and then we find out that there is a huge ettin roaming around, taking out our sentry patrols!$B$B$n, I need you to round up a few friends and take that ettin down. We can't have a beast like that roaming around, wreaking havoc.$B$BStay alert, reports from the front say that he is carrying a huge tree as a weapon, and he is not afraid to use it.
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been asked to kill Problim, a giant ettin that roams the paths of Tol Barad.
QuestData.RewardText: You actually killed him?! I can't believe it!
